title: SJB decides to extend conditional support to government
body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) working committee yesterday decided to participate in the government subjected to conditions, MP Eran Wickramaratne said yesterday.
“The working committee affirmed the decision that we are ready to participate in government if President agrees to change the Executive Presidential system,” MP. Wickramaratne told Daily Mirror.

“We appeal to friendly countries to assist with the necessary essentials of Gas, Fuel, Medicines and food. We will also bring forward legislation to minimise bribery and corruption, and recover stolen assets,” he said.
Also, MP Mujibur Rahman said the working committee decided to hold inquiries on Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakkara who took up ministries in violation of party decisions. (Yohan Perera)
